events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for days, and I'm really worried about the delay in shipping.
The reported problem was categorized as a Delivery Delay based on customer mention of late shipping and tracking issues.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah L., who specializes in shipping and logistics related inquiries.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help you track it and get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the shipping address used so I can check the latest updates from the carrier?
Sure, my order number is 98327465 and the shipping address is 123 Elm Street, Springfield, IL. Thank you for looking into this.

I have checked with the courier and your package is currently delayed due to unforeseen transit issues. We expect delivery within 3 more days. Alternatively, I can arrange a courier inquiry or reship the item if it doesn’t arrive by then.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you checking on this and letting me know there’s a timeline. I prefer to wait the 3 days and see if it arrives.
Your order was delivered today as per the courier confirmation. Please check your mailbox and let us know if everything is in order. Thank you for your patience.
Just following up to ensure your package arrived safely and that you are satisfied with the delivery process. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Since we have received no further concerns, we are closing the case. Thank you for allowing us to assist you. Have a great day!
